subject: Basketball (College)
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: Kevin Ware Sr. still hasn’t seen the injury that knocked his son out of the Final Four, but he made sure he was by his side when Louisville beat Wichita State.
snippet: Kevin Ware Sr. still hasn’t seen the injury that knocked his son out of the Final Four, but he made sure he was by his side when Louisville beat Wichita State.
